abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos announce Peyton Manning will be starting quarterback in playoffs; other football news noted.

headline.print_headline: Manning to Start for Broncos in Playoffs
headline.main: Peyton Manning to Start for Broncos in Playoffs

snippet: Coach Gary Kubiak is going with Peyton Manning, who has been slowed this season by a foot injury.
lead_paragraph: Coach Gary Kubiak is going with Peyton Manning, who has been slowed this season by a foot injury.
